name: Finding Courage
description:
Finding Courage is a platformer about a simple circle in search of courage to overcome fear. Face fear through traversing a level based around the fear of the dark. This game was made for the Mini Jam 77 based on the theme courage. 

--You can move in the menu, jump into the light at the bottom of the screen to start--

All art was made in unity with simple shapes and music was made in beep box (www.beepbox.co) by me as well. I really wanted there to be more levels but unfortunately there was only time to complete the first.
